strata.name: screenedForUse
strata.description: Percentage of patients aged 18 years and older who were screened for tobacco use one or more times within 24 months

strata.name: overall
strata.description: Percentage of patients aged 18 years and older who were screened for tobacco use and identified as a tobacco user who received tobacco cessation intervention

strata.name: tobacco
strata.description: Percentage of patients aged 18 years and older who were screened for tobacco use one or more times within 24 months AND who received tobacco cessation intervention if identified as a tobacco user

strata.name: LVSD
strata.description: Percentage of patients with a diagnosis of CAD or history of cardiac surgery who have a current or prior LVEF < 40% who were prescribed beta-blocker therapy

strata.name: priorMI
strata.description: Percentage of patients with a diagnosis of CAD or history of cardiac surgery who have a prior (within the past 3 years) myocardial infarction who were prescribed beta-blocker therapy

strata.name: 4MonthsOfEnd
strata.description: Office visit, Psych visit, or Face to Face Interaction (No ED) within 4 months of the end of the measurement period that leads to a diagnosis of major depression including remission or dysthymia

strata.name: 4&8MonthsAfterStart
strata.description: Office visit, Psych visit, or Face to Face Interaction (No ED) between 4 and 8 months after the start of the measurement period that leads to a diagnosis of major depression including remission or dysthymia

strata.name: 4MonthsOfStart
strata.description: Office visit, Psych visit, or Face to Face Interaction (No ED) within 4 months of the start of the measurement period that leads to a diagnosis of major depression including remission or dysthymia

strata.name: Within12Months
strata.description: Patients who were prescribed ACE inhibitor or ARB therapy within a 12-month period

strata.name: HospitalDischarge
strata.description: Patients who were prescribed ACE inhibitor or ARB therapy at each hospital discharge

strata.name: Within12Months
strata.description: Percentage of patients aged >= 18 years with a diagnosis of heart failure with a current or prior L.V.E.F. < 40% who were prescribed beta-blocker therapy within a 12-month period

strata.name: HospitalDischarge
strata.description: Percentage of patients aged >= 18 years with a diagnosis of heart failure with a current or prior LVEF < 40% who were prescribed beta-blocker therapy at each hospital discharge

strata.name: Chemotherapy
strata.description: Face to Face Encounter with Ongoing Chemotherapy

strata.name: clinicalASCVD
strata.description: Adults aged >= 21 years who were previously diagnosed with or currently have an active diagnosis of clinical ASCVD

strata.name: >21Familial
strata.description: Adults aged >= 21 years who had fasting or direct LDL-C level >= 190 mg/dL or have been previously or currently diagnosed with of familial or pure HCL

strata.name: between40And75
strata.description: Adults aged 40-75 years with a diagnosis of diabetes with a fasting or direct LDL-C level of 70-189 mg/dL

Percentage of adolescent patients (aged 12-17 years) with a diagnosis of major depression or dysthymia and an initial PHQ-9 or PHQ-9M score greater than nine during the index event who reached remission at twelve months as demonstrated by a twelve month (+/-60 days) PHQ-9 or PHQ-9M score of less than 5.

Percentage of adult patients (aged 18 years or older) with a diagnosis of major depression or dysthymia and aninitial PHQ-9 or PHQ-9M score greater than nine during the index event who reached remission at twelve months as demonstrated by a twelve month (+/-60 days) PHQ-9 or PHQ-9M score of less than 5.
